text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/directness defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
low Low quality match between observed and intended variableLow matching quality between observed and intended variable, so very serious concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.
moderate Moderate quality match between observed and intended variableModerate matching quality between observed and intended variable, so serious concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.
high High quality match between observed and intended variableHigh matching quality between observed and intended variable, so little concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.
exact Exact match between observed and intended variableExact matching quality between observed and intended variable, so no concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.

name: EvidenceDirectness
title: EvidenceDirectness
description: The quality of how direct the match is.

concept.display: Low quality match between observed and intended variable
concept.definition: Low matching quality between observed and intended variable, so very serious concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.

concept.display: Moderate quality match between observed and intended variable
concept.definition: Moderate matching quality between observed and intended variable, so serious concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.

concept.display: High quality match between observed and intended variable
concept.definition: High matching quality between observed and intended variable, so little concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.

concept.display: Exact match between observed and intended variable
concept.definition: Exact matching quality between observed and intended variable, so no concern for indirectness in evidence interpretation.
